      • createFromHex

        public static MosaicNonce createFromHex(java.lang.String hex)
        Create a MosaicNonce from hexadecimal notation.
        Parameters:
        hex - hex representation of nonce bytes
        Returns:
        MosaicNonce nonce defined by hex string
        Throws:
        IllegalIdentifierException - thrown when number of bytes does not mat expectation or hex contains invalid hexadecimal string

      • createFromBigInteger

        public static MosaicNonce createFromBigInteger(java.math.BigInteger number)
        Create a MosaicNonce from a BigInteger. BEWARE this uses little endian while getNonceAsInt uses big endian. do not mix the two
        Parameters:
        number - numeric representation of nonce bytes
        Returns:
        MosaicNonce the nonce
